Question:
In each of the following questions, five words have been given out of which four are alike in some manner, while the fifth one is different. Choose the word which is different from the rest.

Choose the word which is different from the rest.

A. Guava
B. Litchi
C. Papaya
D. Watermelon
E. Jackfruit
Solution: All except Watermelon grow on trees, while watermelon grows on creepers.

Question:
In each of the following questions, five words have been given out of which four are alike in some manner, while the fifth one is different. Choose the word which is different from the rest.

Choose the word which is different from the rest.

A. Cabbage
B. Papaya
C. Gourd
D. Cucumber
E. Brinjal
Solution: All except Papaya are vegetables, while papaya is a fruit.

Question:
In each of the following questions, five words have been given out of which four are alike in some manner, while the fifth one is different. Choose the word which is different from the rest.

Choose the word which is different from the rest.

A. Jordan
B. Bhutan
C. Turkey
D. Norway
E. Spain
Solution: All except Turkey are countries ruled by kings.

Question:
In each of the following questions, five words have been given out of which four are alike in some manner, while the fifth one is different. Choose the word which is different from the rest.

Choose the word which is different from the rest.

A. Engineer
B. Architect
C. Mechanic
D. Mason
E. Blacksmith
Solution: All except Mechanic help in building a house.

Question:
In each of the following questions, five words have been given out of which four are alike in some manner, while the fifth one is different. Choose the word which is different from the rest.

Choose the word which is different from the rest.

A. Sleet
B. Fog
C. Hailstone
D. Vapour
E. Mist
Solution: All except Vapour are different forms of precipitation.
